article_node.title: Gabelli Multimedia Trust Reinforces Maintenance of $0.88 Per Share Annual Distribution Continues Monthly Distributions
article_node.summary: The Gabelli Multimedia Trust Inc. board has approved continuing its fixed monthly cash distribution policy, maintaining a quarterly distribution of $0.22 per share split as $0.07 for the first two months and $0.08 for the third. The trust will no longer rely on an SEC exemptive order to distribute long‑term capital gains more frequently, instead distributing taxable income monthly and long‑term gains annually. Distributions may include return of capital and can be adjusted by the board to reflect income fluctuations, with no guarantee of a fixed rate or schedule.
